text:
@JoeBiden I’m surprised you don’t personally blame Trump for all deaths/ all causes in the US since the start of his term. 
Do you have ANY tweets wherein you warned of the COVID19 “pandemic” in Dec-Feb? Were your crystal balls working? Or are you just one more irritating Mon morning QB?
